default.label: Shopping Points
default.comment: <script type="text/javascript"> //awardpoints_default_auto_use //awardpoints_default_step_apply //awardpoints_default_step_value //awardpoints_default_full_use checkAutoUse = function(){ if ($('awardpoints_default_auto_use').getValue() == 1){ var options = $$('select#awardpoints_default_step_apply option'); var len = options.length; for (var i = 0; i < len; i++) { if(options[i].value == 0){ options[i].selected = true; } } $('awardpoints_default_step_apply').up(1).hide(); $('awardpoints_default_step_value').up(1).hide(); $('awardpoints_default_full_use').up(1).hide(); } else { $('awardpoints_default_step_apply').up(1).show(); $('awardpoints_default_step_value').up(1).show(); $('awardpoints_default_full_use').up(1).show(); checkStepUse(); } }; checkStepUse = function(){ if ($('awardpoints_default_step_apply').getValue() == 1){ $('awardpoints_default_step_value').up(1).show(); } else { $('awardpoints_default_step_value').up(1).hide(); } }; Event.observe(window, 'load', function() { Event.observe('awardpoints_default_auto_use', 'change', checkAutoUse); Event.observe('awardpoints_default_step_apply', 'change', checkStepUse); checkAutoUse(); checkStepUse(); }); </script>

money_points.label: Factor Money to Point
money_points.comment: Points gathered for 1 unit of money spent. (e.g. if set to 0.01, the client will obtain 1 point for each 100yen spent. If set to 1 the client will obtain 1 point for each yen spent).

points_money.label: Factor Point to Money
points_money.comment: Amount of points required to obtain a discount.(e.g. if set to 1, 1 point will equal to 1 yen discount. If set to 10, 10 point will equal to 1 yen discount)

max_point_collect_order.label: Maximum points collected per order
max_point_collect_order.comment: Maximum amount of points that can be collected per order (use 0 for unlimited).

max_point_used_order.label: Maximum points used per order
max_point_used_order.comment: Maximum amount of points that can be used per order (use 0 for unlimited).

min_subtotal.label: Minimum Subtotal
min_subtotal.comment: Minimum Subtotal value in which the points cannot be applied (if set to 0 the system will allow to apply points until reaching a subtotal of 0).

auto_use.label: Automatic use of points
auto_use.comment: The maximum amount of point for the cart will be apply to the order automatically.

step_apply.label: Apply points by step
step_apply.comment: Apply the points using a step by step type (Dropdown box). e.g. 100, 200, 500, etc.

step_value.label: Step value
step_value.comment: Apply the points using a step by step method (Dropdown box)

full_use.label: Use max amount of points
full_use.comment: Apply the maximum amount of point to the order

math_method.label: Calculation Method
math_method.comment: Type of Calculation method which will be used when converting money to points

coupon_codes.label: Disable Coupon codes
coupon_codes.comment: If enabled, the customers will not be able to use coupon codes and award points at the same time within an order.

store_scope.label: Use store scope
store_scope.comment: If enabled, the points collected will be available only for the same store in which the points were earned.

referral_show.label: Enable Referral Points
referral_show.comment: Enable the Referral Points System on user account Navigation Panel.

registration_points.label: Registration Points
registration_points.comment: Amount of points earned upon customer registration.

review_points.label: Review Points
review_points.comment: Amount of points the customer will earn when his review is approved.

referral_points.label: Referral Points
referral_points.comment: Amount of points earned by the customer for a referred friend orders.

referral_child_points.label: Referral child Points
referral_child_points.comment: Amount of points earned by referred friend for their first order.

referral_permanent.label: Show referral permanent link
referral_permanent.comment: This will allow customers to share permanently their permanent link to refer friends.

referral_addthis.label: Share with addthis
referral_addthis.comment: Allow the customers to share their permanent link using addthis.

referral_addthis_account.label: addthis account name
referral_addthis_account.comment: Store Owner addthis account name. Visit addthis.com to create an account.
